F1,E2.Description: Your dishwasher has experienced an error that will require service to troubleshoot and diagnose the problem and repair as necessary.
StepsToRepair: Service is required. Call 866-333-4591 for Service

F2,E2.Description: Cycle power to the control to reset the dishwasher.
StepsToRepair: Turn off power to the dishwasher by turning off the circuit breaker for one (1) minute.
Turn on power to the dishwasher by turning on the circuit breaker.
Monitor the dishwasher for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again.
Verify dishwasher operation.  If the problem persists, call 866-333-4591 for Service

F2,E3.Description: Your dishwasher has experienced an error that will require service to troubleshoot and diagnose the problem and repair as necessary.
StepsToRepair: Service is required. Call 866-333-4591 for Service

NestSettings.QuietWhileHome.Name: Quiet While Home
NestSettings.QuietWhileHome.Description: Your dishwasher will automatically go into Quiet Mode when Nest™ knows you’re home.
NestSettings.WashWhileAway.Name: Wash While Away
NestSettings.WashWhileAway.Description: When Nest™ detects you're away, your dishwasher will start the selected cycle.  Please note that it may take up to two hours for Nest™ to send the away signal.
NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Name: Smart Delay
NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Description: Use Smart Delay to delay your dishwasher from running during peak energy hours.

ControlLock.Name: Control Lock
ControlLock.Description: Remotely disable the control panel to avoid unintended use no matter where you are.

RemoteStatus.Name: Remote Control
RemoteStatus.Description: Allows you to send remote control of your dishwasher to your smartphone or mobile device via the Whirlpool® app. Lets you manage when to run.  Appliance will not start unless remote control is enabled on the dishwasher.

AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Name: affresh® Dishwasher Cleaner
AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Description: Power away - the right way affresh® Dishwasher Clearn is specially formulated to help remove limescale and mineral build-up that can be unsightly and could affect your dishwasher's performance. Each tablet is designed to clean inside your machine while your detergent cleans your dishes.*
AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Disclaimer: check manufacturer's suggest cleaning instructions on all dishwasher-save items.

Quiet.Name: Quiet Mode
Quiet.Description: Quiet Mode Minimizes the appliances operating noise and mutes alert sounds.

Control.Name: Control Lock
Control.Description: Control Lock status of the control panel to prevent unintended use of the participating appliances.

Vacation.Name: Vacation Mode
Vacation.Description: Vacation Mode monitors use of your appliances while you're away.

SmartTip.Title: Interested in improved drying for your dishes?
SmartTip.Content: Improve drying performance and control buildup of hard water deposits by using rinse aid, which allows water to drain off your dishes after the final rinse.

SmartTip.Title: Want to keep your dishwasher performing at its best?
SmartTip.Content: Regular filter maintenance optimizes water and energy conservation. Cleaning and rinsing both upper and lower filters once a month helps your dishwasher continue to provide optimal cleaning.

SmartTip.Title: Ready to conserve even more energy?
SmartTip.Content: Delay starting a dishwasher cycle when energy demand is high by opting into Smart Delay through your local utility company.* This could even result in a lower energy bill. *For informational purposes only. Not all time-of-use rate plans are compatable with Energy Advisor.

SmartTip.Title: Need a cycle you can't find on the control panel?
SmartTip.Content: Get the right clean for your load by downloading specialty cycles with the Download & Go™ option. You can customize your cleaning even more by creating and saving your own cycle, too.
